news.title: Disappointing holiday season: December retail sales were flat, falling well short of estimate
news.summary: Consumer activity slowed sharply for the December holiday shopping season. Consumer activity slows sharply for December holiday season, according to the NSC. NSC: Retail sales down sharply for holiday season in December.

news.title: Kalshi says Super Bowl trading volume surpassed $1 billion
news.summary: Kalshi CEO Tarek Mansour said Tuesday that the platform's Super Bowl trading volume exceeded $1 billion, up 2,700% year-over-year.

news.title: Paramount sweetens WBD bid, but stops short of raising its per-share value
news.summary: Paramount has sweetened its offer for Warner Bros. Discovery, adding a so-called "ticking fee" to signal regulatory confidence among other new elements.

news.title: 'Impossible': Taiwan pushes back against Washington’s 40% chip supply relocation goal
news.summary: Taiwan has told Washington that its proposal to move 40% of Taiwan's semiconductor supply chain is "impossible," Vice Premier Cheng Li-chiun says.

news.title: Spotify pops 14% on strong user growth, earnings beat
news.summary: Spotify's stock popped as the music streaming platform reported strong monthly average user growth. Spotify said it had its best "Spotify Wrapped" ever.

news.title: Retail sales fizzled at the end of the holiday season, as tariffs alter Americans’ buying habits.
news.summary: Sales at U.S retailers fizzled at the end of the holiday shopping season. Consumers worried about the economy might be cutting back on spending as a new year got underway.

news.title: This is the analyst who has gold bugs thinking $12,000 is not only possible, it’s the right price
news.summary: Myrmikan Capital’s Daniel Oliver says we’re in the first phase of a massive bull market. Oliver says the second could come fast.

news.title: BP to halt stock buybacks ahead of new CEO’s start
news.summary: BP said it was halting stock buybacks as the oil and gas giant said it wanted to rebuild its balance sheet. BP is one of the world's biggest oil companies.

news.title: Why stocks have climbed even after the appearance of three Hindenburg Omens
news.summary: The dreaded bear-market predictor isn't so ominous, after all. The U.S. stock market is up more than 1.5 percent this year.

news.title: Microsoft and Oracle may be bargain stocks, according to this analysis
news.summary: Both stocks are relatively cheap on an earnings basis. The companies have projected revenue growth rates much higher than that of the S&P 500.
